question: Which institution has launched a 5000-crore scheme for computerisation of Primary Agricultural Credit Societies (PACS)?
option2: National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development
answer: National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development
explanation:
The National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development (NABARD) has announced Rs 5,000 crore worth grant-based scheme for computerisation of about 35,000 Primary Agricultural Credit Societies (PACS) by FY23.
The scheme, apart from providing assistance to state governments for the process also ensures integration of the PACS with the Core Banking System (CBS) of District Central Co-operative Banks.
